solution_line_template: If the blue car can travel at {blue_speed} mph, then the green one can travel at {green_to_blue_ratio}*{blue_speed}=<<{green_to_blue_ratio}*{blue_speed}={green_speed}>>{green_speed} mph
If the green car can travel at {green_speed} mph, then the red can travel at {red_to_green_ratio}*{green_speed}={red_speed} mph
